question: Create a basic ASP page that displays 'Hello, World!'
Write an ASP script to display the current date and time.
solution:
<%@ Language=VBScript %>
<html>
<body>
<%
Response.Write "Current date and time: " & Now()
%>
</body>
</html>

question: Create an ASP page that accepts user input and displays it.
solution:
<%@ Language=VBScript %>
<html>
<body>
<form method="post">
  Enter your name: <input type="text" name="name">
  <input type="submit" value="Submit">
</form>
<%
If Request.ServerVariables("REQUEST_METHOD") = "POST" Then
  Dim userName
  userName = Request.Form("name")
  Response.Write "Hello, " & userName & "!"
End If
%>
</body>
</html>

question: Write an ASP script to calculate the factorial of a number.
solution:
<%@ Language=VBScript %>
<html>
<body>
<%
Function factorial(n)
  If n = 0 Then
    factorial = 1
  Else
    factorial = n * factorial(n - 1)
  End If
End Function
Dim num, result
num = CInt(Request.QueryString("number"))
result = factorial(num)
Response.Write "Factorial of " & num & " is " & result
%>
</body>
</html>

question: Create an ASP script to validate a form with required fields.
solution:
<%@ Language=VBScript %>
Enter your name:
Enter your email:
<% If Request.ServerVariables("REQUEST_METHOD") = "POST" Then Dim userName, userEmail userName = Request.Form("name") userEmail = Request.Form("email") If userName = "" Or userEmail = "" Then Response.Write "Please fill in all fields" Else Response.Write "Form submitted successfully" End If End If %>

question: Write an ASP script to display all files in a directory.
solution:
<%@ Language=VBScript %> <% Dim fso, folder, files, file Set fso = Server.CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") Set folder = fso.GetFolder(Server.MapPath(".")) Set files = folder.Files For Each file in files Response.Write file.Name & "
" Next Set fso = Nothing Set folder = Nothing Set files = Nothing %>

question: Create an ASP page to read and display content from a text file.
solution:
<%@ Language=VBScript %>
<html>
<body>
<%
Dim fso, file, text
Set fso = Server.CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
Set file = fso.OpenTextFile(Server.MapPath("data.txt"), 1)
text = file.ReadAll
file.Close
Response.Write text
Set fso = Nothing
Set file = Nothing
%>
</body>
</html>

question: Write an ASP script to handle sessions to count the number of visits to a page.
solution:
<%@ Language=VBScript %>
<html>
<body>
<%
Dim count
If Session("visits") = "" Then
  Session("visits") = 1
Else
  count = CInt(Session("visits"))
  count = count + 1
  Session("visits") = count
End If
Response.Write "Number of visits: " & Session("visits")
%>
</body>
</html>

question: Create an ASP page that generates a random number between 1 and 100 on each refresh.
solution:
<%@ Language=VBScript %>
<html>
<body>
<%
Randomize
Dim randomNumber
randomNumber = Int((100 - 1 + 1) * Rnd + 1)
Response.Write "Random number: " & randomNumber
%>
</body>
</html>

question: Write an ASP script to display an image with alternate text.
Create an ASP page to demonstrate session timeout handling.
solution:
<%@ Language=VBScript %>
<%
If Session("start") = "" Then
  Session.Timeout = 1 ' session timeout in minutes
  Session("start") = Now()
  Response.Write "Session started"
Else
  Dim startTime
  startTime = CDate(Session("start"))
  Dim currentTime
  currentTime = Now()
  Dim elapsedMinutes
  elapsedMinutes = DateDiff("n", startTime, currentTime)
  If elapsedMinutes >= Session.Timeout Then
    Response.Write "Session expired"
  Else
    Response.Write "Session active"
  End If
End If
%>

question: Write an ASP script to handle errors and display a custom error message.
solution:
<%@ Language=VBScript %> <% On Error Resume Next Dim num1, num2, result num1 = Request.Form("num1") num2 = Request.Form("num2") result = num1 / num2 If Err.Number <> 0 Then Response.Write "Error: Division by zero" Err.Clear Else Response.Write "Result: " & result End If %>

question: Create an ASP script to upload a file and save it on the server.
solution:
<%@ Language=VBScript %> <% Dim objFSO, objFile, strFile, strDirectory strDirectory = Server.MapPath(".") & "\uploads\" Set objFSO = Server.CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") If Not objFSO.FolderExists(strDirectory) Then objFSO.CreateFolder(strDirectory) End If Set objFile = objFSO.GetFile(Request.Files("file").Item) strFile = objFile.Name If strFile <> "" Then Request.Files("file").SaveAs strDirectory & strFile Response.Write "File uploaded successfully: " & strFile Else Response.Write "No file selected" End If Set objFile = Nothing Set objFSO = Nothing %>
Select file to upload:

question: Write an ASP script to create a simple login form with authentication.
solution:
<%@ Language=VBScript %> <% If Request.ServerVariables("REQUEST_METHOD") = "POST" Then Dim username, password username = Request.Form("username") password = Request.Form("password") If username = "admin" And password = "password" Then Response.Write "Login successful" Else Response.Write "Invalid username or password" End If End If %>

question: Write an ASP script to create a simple shopping cart.
solution:
<%@ Language=VBScript %> <% If Request.ServerVariables("REQUEST_METHOD") = "POST" Then Dim item, price, quantity item = Request.Form("item") price = Request.Form("price") quantity = Request.Form("quantity") If item <> "" And IsNumeric(price) And IsNumeric(quantity) Then Session(item) = Session(item) + quantity Response.Write "Item added to cart" Else Response.Write "Invalid input" End If End If %>
Item:
Price:
Quantity:

question: Write an ASP script to display the list of databases on the server.
solution:
<%@ Language=VBScript %> <% Dim adoConn, adoRS, strConnect, strSQL Set adoConn = Server.CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") strConnect = "Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=yourServer;User ID=yourUsername;Password=yourPassword;" adoConn.Open strConnect strSQL = "SELECT name FROM master..sysdatabases" Set adoRS = adoConn.Execute(strSQL) Do Until adoRS.EOF Response.Write adoRS.Fields("name").Value & "
" adoRS.MoveNext Loop adoRS.Close Set adoRS = Nothing adoConn.Close Set adoConn = Nothing %>

question: Create an ASP page to perform CRUD operations on a database table.
solution:
<%@ Language=VBScript %> <% Dim adoConn, adoRS, strConnect, strSQL Set adoConn = Server.CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") strConnect = "Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=yourServer;User ID=yourUsername;Password=yourPassword;" adoConn.Open strConnect strSQL = "SELECT * FROM yourTable" Set adoRS = adoConn.Execute(strSQL) While Not adoRS.EOF Response.Write adoRS.Fields("columnName").Value & "
" adoRS.MoveNext Wend adoRS.Close Set adoRS = Nothing adoConn.Close Set adoConn = Nothing %>

question: Write an ASP script to create a simple RSS feed.
solution:
<%@ Language=VBScript %>
<%
Response.ContentType = "text/xml"
Response.Write "<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>"
Response.Write "<rss version='2.0'>"
Response.Write "<channel>"
Response.Write "<title>Your RSS Feed</title>"
Response.Write "<link>http://www.example.com</link>"
Response.Write "<description>Your RSS Feed Description</description>"
Response.Write "<item>"
Response.Write "<title>Item Title</title>"
Response.Write "<link>http://www.example.com/item1</link>"
Response.Write "<description>Item Description</description>"
Response.Write "</item>"
Response.Write "</channel>"
Response.Write "</rss>"
%>
